question: Will April 2024 show an increase of less than 1.14C?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the data for the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for April 2024 shows an increase of less than 1.14°C when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An anomaly of less than 1.14°C for April 2024 is necessary and sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" immediately once the data becomes available regardless of whether the figure for April 2024 is later revised.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figure found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "Apr" in the row "2024" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for April 2024 is provided by NASA by June 1, 2024, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve "No".

question: Will April 2024 show an increase between 1.14°C-1.19°C?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the data for the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for April 2024 shows an increase of between 1.14°C (inclusive) and 1.19°C (inclusive) when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An anomaly of between 1.14°C (inclusive) and 1.19°C (inclusive) for April 2024 is necessary and sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" immediately once the data becomes available regardless of whether the figure for April 2024 is later revised.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figure found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "Apr" in the row "2024" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for April 2024 is provided by NASA by June 1, 2024, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve "No."

question: US inflation >0.3% from March to April 2024?
description:
This is a market on a month-to-month inflation, as measured by the Bureau of Labor Statistics (CPI-U), from March to April 2024. Inflation is measured by a change in Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers (CPI-U) on a seasonally adjusted basis, reported by the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the index increased by more than 0.3 percent (on a seasonally adjusted basis) from March to April 2024 and “No“ otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be the BLS April 2024 Consumer Price Index report (https://www.bls.gov/bls/news-release/cpi.htm), currently scheduled to be released on May 15, 2024, at 8:30 AM ET. Resolution of this market will take place upon release of the aforementioned data.

----

The Consumer Price Index (CPI) is a measure of the average change over time in the prices paid by urban consumers for a market basket of consumer goods and services.

Note: the resolution source for this market will be the official monthly BLS CPI news release which reports seasonally-adjusted month-to-month inflation to only one decimal point (e.g. 0.7%). Thus, this is the level of precision that will be used when resolving the market (e.g. if seasonally adjusted month-to-month CPI-U is 0.4%, the market will resolve to “Yes”, if it is 0.3%, this market will resolve to “No”).

question: Will Matt Gaetz be expelled from Congress before July?
description:
The House Ethics Committee is investigating Matt Gaetz over allegations he paid for sex with women and an underage teenager.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Matt Gaetz is expelled from Congress by June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official resolutions from the House of Representatives and information from the Government of the United States of America, however a consensus of credible reporting will suffice.

question: Israel military action against Iran by April 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel initiates a military action on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory between April 10 and April 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Israel on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Iranian soil is hit by an Israeli missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Israeli government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

question: U.S. military action against Iran by April 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the United States initiates a military action on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory between April 10 and April 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by the U.S. on Iranian soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Iranian soil is hit by an U.S. missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the U.S. government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

In the case that the "Yes" resolution criteria are met prior to this market's resolution date, this market will resolve immediately.

question: KO in the Ansem/Barney fight?
description:
Ansem (@blknoiz06) is scheduled to fight Barney (@barneytheboi) on April 19, 2024 in Dubai. You can view this post to learn more: https://twitter.com/RookieXBT/status/1765082785126219980

If this fight ends in a knockout (KO) or technical knockout (TKO), this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If this fight is declared a draw, postponed after April 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve to "No".

question: $DEGEN all time high in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Degen (Base) ($DEGEN) reaches a price greater than $0.06454 (i.e. 0.06455 or higher) for the first time between April 11, 2024 11:00 AM ET and April 30, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/degen-base), specifically the All time high figure and date on the right box. If CoinGecko becomes unavailable or fails to update, a consensus of highly liquid sources will be used instead.

question: Will Barney cry?
description:
Ansem (@blknoiz06) is scheduled to fight Barney (@barneytheboi) on April 19, 2024 in Dubai. You can view this post to learn more: https://twitter.com/RookieXBT/status/1765082785126219980

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Barney (@barneytheboi) cries at any point while on camera while at the venue of his fight with Ansem scheduled for April 19, 2024 in Dubai. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, 'crying' is defined as the visible shedding of tears that can be clearly observed on Barney's face. The 'crying' can take place at any time Barney is on camera and present at the fight venue even if the fight isn't ongoing.

This market will resolve to "No" if barney has left the venue after the fight and did not end up crying. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be footage of the fight, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
